comment: I freaking love Cathy Bradford. I took her seminar class as a part of a learning community. I loved her class and I love her even more. You cant miss many classes before it affects you grade but it wasn't a problem for me because the class was fun and easy! (no tests/quizzes, didnt even buy the textbook!!)
Professor Bradford is the sweetest teacher I have ever met. She only wants the best for all of her students. All work in this class is super easy. Take her if you get the chance.
Professor Bradford is great. You will love her if you have her. However, she does give busy work sometimes, which can be annoying.

Except for my roommates, I met all my new college friends in this class. I'm very shy around new people so this is a big deal. The teacher  is  nice. I would recommend this class and teacher to anyone that is worried about meeting people.
Bradford's teaching style is  activities, group discussions, and assignments. She doesn't like to lecture but when she does, she keeps it short and to-the-point. I would take her again.
I absolutely love her and her class. She really cares about her students and that is what makes her so AWESOME.

I love Ms.  Bradford  and would take her  again for the freshman course and learning community. Tests are multiple choice and short essay. A  group service project and a few assignments that aren't hard. Do the. campus events! Ms. Bradford is the kind of teacher. who makes you glad you came to class. She mixes it up to make learning fun .

Professor Bradford does an excellent job of teaching her students about life in and beyond college. She always makes it very clear that she is available for consultation. Also, she obviously cares deeply that each of her students gain knowledge from her classes. You need the textbooks for exams, but there is always an extra credit opportunity.

Professor B is a fantastic teacher! She is very caring and makes it very easy to enjoy and pass her class with an A. She uses different learning methods for each lesson and makes the lectures enjoyable with group projects and hands-on assignments. I don't think a single person in this class made lower than an A.

I love Professor B! She's awesome. She's so caring and wants every student to succeed. She is very passionate about what she teaches! We did a lot of activities  and overall just a fun class! Do campus events to get extra credit on tests!

TAKE HER! Best Freshman Seminar professor at KSU. She is very helpful and is always willing to talk to you. Two tests that are not difficult and you play a review game the class before! Easily my favorite professor yet!

I LOVE PROF B!!! She is kind, intelligent, and very helpful! I came into class on the first day thinking I would hate this class but I ended up LOVING IT!!! This class is super fun and you will definitely gain something; whether it be new friends or learning strategies it's awesome, take PROF B!!! (:

I seriously LOVE Professor Bradford. She will do anything that she can to help you, and she cares about everyone one of her students individually. In our learning community, we did a lot of interactive games, and I looked forward to going to class! If you have the opportunity, TAKE HER!!

Prof. B has a great sense of humor and she is smart and sweet. Some assignments were time consuming but worth it. We did a strategy project that helped me improve my psychology grade by three  letter grades. Some of my friends hated their KSU 1101 class but mine was fun and helpful. I will actually miss this class.

I love this lady, she's awesome. She still helps me even though I am not in her class anymore.  I went to her office last week because I am having trouble in a different class and she still remembers my name and made me feel like I am the most important student she has ever met (maybe i am, haha). thank you Ms. Bradford. You are right, I can do it!

Professor Bradford was my favorite teacher. She is smart and funny and really cares about students. She goes out of her way to help you succeed. I never wanted to miss and  attendance wasn't even required! Take her if you can, you will be glad you did.
